page.title: 13GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Here are some of the games we play at school.... Rounders,Red letter,Queeni and Had. My favourite game is Rounders. Rounders is a game with 2 sides ,a batting side and a bowling side.Each side has a team captain and the team captains choose people to be on their team.Bowling chooses first,then batting and so on. When the teams have been chosen the batting team make a line opposite the person out of the bowling team that has been chosen to bowl.The rest of the team spread themselves out around the bowler. The bowler bowls the ball and the batting captain hits it.There are 4 bases.If the person gets to 4th that is 1 rounder By Joanne Darey,age 10.
